reviewText: One of the best movies in Bollywood, Aamir khan always the best

Cheesy 90s Bollywood fun. Gotta love a hero that can get half way through a triathalon, beat off a bunch of bad guys, then continue for miles on a bicycle race after so many punches to the solar plexus. Not my favorite Aamir Khan movie, but it had its moments of fun and was worth a few hours of my time to watch. I probably would not watch it a second time.

One of the best "growing up" movie ever. The final cycle race gives "the goose bump" even to this day. I hope Mansoor Khan makes more movies. A freshness and innocence -- that is difficult to find in movies these days.
